mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ent_music_singer ( name, en_name, region, initial, birthday, type, star, photo, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{enName}, #{region}, #{initial}, #{birthday}, #{type}, #{star}, #{photo}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, en_name, region, initial, birthday, type, star, photo, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM ent_music_singer WHERE id = #{singerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ent_music_singer SET name = #{name}, en_name = #{enName}, region = #{region}, initial = #{initial}, birthday = #{birthday}, type = #{type}, star = #{star}, photo = #{photo}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
